top_comment.text: Why they link Taemin with Doritos? I just don understand﻿
top_comment.author: Nathaly Sierra

comments.text:
It is an inside joke, the is referring to the song Sherlock. Taemin sings a 
part that sounds like 'Soy un Dorito'.
comments.author: Tomisha Childs

comments.text: Check out their old KMM of Sherlock, that's an epic episode
comments.author: Estrella WJ

captions.text: This week’s Music Monday is the Over Used Joke edition with SHINee’s “Dream Girl”
SHINee’s back
And, you know what, man? SHINee’s great!
Start to finish this song is solid consistent fun.
This is the kind of song that’s gonna go on my morning playlist when I’m getting ready.
There are no right in dub-step breakdowns, no distorted segments of different styles of songs to symbolize some crap or something else
Captain ______
Well, obviously if you went to kpop school as much as I did and studied it to the depth that I do you’d understand that the distortedness of the song represents the flipido flopidafulululu
This is just a plain old great song. Nonstop. I didn’t cringe anywhere. Everything works perfectly together
SHINee from “Ring Ding Dong” to “Lucifer” to “Sherlock” to “Dream Girl” they’re always putting out amazing songs
What about “Hello”?
Eh, hello what?
You know their song Hello, hello
Hm, does not ring a bell. Nope. And if you mention it again I will stab you with the doritos that you’re about to use in your next skit.
I waited for almost a year to be able to do this. Seriously. I brought this sombrero back with me from Mexico.
This is an authentic freakin sombrero. I brought it just for SHINee.
My only small complaint with this song and it’s not even much of a complaint as so much of a comparison is that even though the song is very SHINee-like
It doesn’t have that irresistible conversation altering catch phrase.
One of the things we find about really successful kpop songs is when they have a catchy chorus and include some commonly used English phrases
So that when you use that phrase in everyday life, you wind up singing that song accidently. For example
I can’t say “blow your mind” anymore without breaking into Super Junior.
SHINee’s “Sherlock” did the same thing. When I’m curious about something I inevitably say “I’m so curious yeah~”. That made the song so much more awesome in my mind.
But how often will I bring up Dream Girl in my normal conversation?
Mmm, this coffee is so good. Just Wow fantastic baby. I wonder how they made it I’m so curious yeah~
I know I’ve tried again and again and again and again to reproduce it but I just can’t seem to do it.
First time I had it I just sipped it and I was like Blow your mind whup whup whup this coffee is really delicious
You know I really have to learn how to make coffee Like this yo, like this. Mmm~
It really tastes like a dream… girl?
Now you just made to conversation awkward. Jeez…
Sorry sorry sorry… Sorry
Other than that I Do have a small complaint with the editing. Though I really like the transitions by the end of the video
At the beginning of the video I just thought that my computer was acting all glitchy. The I realized that the glitchyness was on purpose
Fine. I accept that. But I’d rather not hear sound effects with every one of those glitches.
Maybe a couple at the beginning but from then on I actually wanna hear SHINee sing. I don’t wanna hear the video editor draw attention to himself with his trod sound pack
Or have odd sound effects with every single transition
The video was super cool as well. Yes, this is a set. But it’s actually being used in a very active way. It’s not just like bizarre lights and stationary sexy poses
SHINee are dancing around, using their mic stands. They’re crawling on the floor, falling on it, bouncing off of trampolines. It’s a fun video and that matches that fun vibe of the song
But don’t think I didn’t notice that skin tight hot pink turtle neck TaeMAN was wearing.
A hot pink turtle neck with what looks like a woman’s diamond necklace with leggings that look like hot pink underpants?
It kinda looks like what kids try to look like when they wanna be super heroes and they put like their underwear on top of their pants. Their… hot pink… underwear?
What really sucks is that the black and white outfits everyone are wearing look really really good
But then during that patterned jean-phase of clothing all the members have on they have like suit jackets and ties but TaeMAN gets the bizarre hot pink bar___?
Is it just me or is Taemin always getting the super bizarre outfits? Like look at this! He is wearing a spiky collar, sparkly bracelets a sports jersey underneath overall jeans shorts?
Which look much more like a giant thigh-die–diaper
Look me in the eyes, look at me and tell me with a straight face, tell me that you’d Love your boyfriend to wear this outfit.
Because if you can say that, you’re a dirty filthy liar. Lies~
We just don’t get why this always happens to Taemin in particular.
It’s like how Amber from f(x) is always the one member wearing pants, shorts and tomboy outfits.
*le gasp* Oh dear God! Amber gets dressed like a boy, Taemin gets dressed like a woman. Was Taemin supposed to be in f(x)and Amber supposed to be in SHINee?
*le longer gasp*
Thank you for getting me out of that.
No. SM just has some fashion terrorist outfit designers.
Now although we Did like this Music Video I do confess I miss seeing a dance focused SHINee video.
This is more of them singing and posing and there were like a little bit of cuts of dancing in there but not enough.
Nothing epic what we can recreate in the streets of Seoul. Unless you consider SHINee falling on the floor and rolling around a dance?
Go home SHINee, you’re drunk.
But who knows, maybe we can look forward to another single coming out that will showcase an awesome dance by them. In another year…
As for the English of the song I give this a…
5 out of 5
Besides the whole Dream Girl chorus there are a few typical English phrases sprinkled throughout here and there like “baby” and “you’re so beautiful” and “you’re my world”
And they’re all fine, so 5 out of 5? No complaints on my end.
Last week we asked you which somewhat similarly plotted video you preferred. B.A.P.’s “One Shot” or Block B’s “nilililililili mambo”.
And the winner. Just barely. Whoa, like just so so so barely was Block B.
First time in a long time we had a close battle like this. Congrats to Block B and stay strong, yo.
For this week’s showdown we ask you which weird rotating room set you preferred SHINee’s in “Dream Girl” or U-kiss’s in “Doradora”.
U-kiss wins almost every showdown but can they beat SHINee in a SHINee KMM? Only time will tell.
Leave your votes in your comments and we’ll announce the winners next week.
If there is a video you wanna see us do for next week’s KMM let us know by heading on over to eatyourkimchi.com/kpopcharts and voting there
Also if you miss the TaeMAN doritos as much as I do check out our awesome Soy Un Dorito shirt in our t-shirt store. We’ve got other cool stuff there too.
And for those of you who wanna see who won the B.A.P. CD from last week’s give away, we’re announcing those in the bloopers so check those out.
Lastly, don’t forget to like and favorite this video and to subscribe for more Music Mondays, take it away dreamy Spudgy.
